From: KSLawdogg@...

(To save time, I'll assume I can move Cliffjumper and Strafe, if you 
disapprove, Jer, just let me know)

Otyebis Soldiers:




One of the two skimmers landed, the other staying airborne to provide air 
support if needed.  The landed skinner opened a hatch in its side, a dozen 
laser-rifle armed humanoid bipeds in gold and red pouring out and flowing to 
Cliffjumper and Strafe, picking them up and loading them into the skimmer, 
the craft rising and both IGL skimmers blasting off at full speed towards the 
Otyebis.
